entry.content:
It's been 7 years since I wrote an article on the web. At that time, I was starting my bachelor, and managed to maintain a blog called Z-Graphics to help Blogger users enhance their sites. It was all about minor hacks and tutorials in Spanish. Although I must say, it wasn't just about writing and getting occasional anonymous comments, but the community around blogs with Ã± (in Spanish); I met amazing people, and gained 37 readers, of which 3 of them were my own emails ðŸ˜….

During the past years I've learnt many things, and it all has come to the point that sharing is a necessity. I'll be writing about software engineering, object-oriented programming, research, and events.

In case you're interested, the technology behind this blog is:

  • Pelican: a static site generator
  • Foundation: a responsive front-end framework
  • Prism: a lightweight and extensible syntax highlighter
  • npm, bower, gulp
